org.apache.flex.compiler.parsing

Interface IMXMLTokenizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MXMLTokenizer

    public interface IMXMLTokenizer
    An interface for tokenizing MXML 3/4 source code. For a given reader, we will return an array of tokens that we've determined to be correct for the given range

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IMXMLToken[] getTokens(Reader reader)
      Returns an array of IMXMLToken objects for a given range of text represented by a Reader
      IMXMLToken[] getTokens(String range)
      Returns an array of IMXMLToken objects for a given range of text represented by a String
      void setIsRepairing(boolean isRepairing)
      Sets a flag to indicate whether this tokenizer should try to repair its token stream

    • Method Detail

        Sets a flag to indicate whether this tokenizer should try to repair its token stream

        IMXMLToken[] getTokens(Reader reader)
